info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Millard and western Sevier Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 414 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cove Fort, or 23 miles southwest of Fillmore, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hatton. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 135 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
